revised_title: Influence of Transition Bands on Recrystallization in Metals
tldr: The authors analyze the conditions under which transition bands, regions of high lattice distortion, develop during metal deformation and how they influence the process of recrystallization. They propose a model for the mechanism of nucleation of recrystallization in transition bands and discuss the dependence of these processes on crystallographic orientation, relating it to the formation of recrystallization textures in body-centered cubic metals.
